sentences.en: An introductory course in the molecular biology of the auditory system.
sentences.cn: 此课为听觉系统的分子生物学之导论课程.

sentences.en: An introductory paragraph has been prefixed to Chapter Three.
as the chairman said in his introductory remarks
sentences.cn: 正如主席在开场白中所说的

sentences.en: Clara moved her lips to recall remarks introductory to so abrupt and strange plunge.
sentences.cn: 克莱拉嘴唇蠕动着,想对如此突如其来而且十分怪异的窘境说一段开场白.

sentences.en: Go straight to the experts for an introductory course in book illustration.
sentences.cn: 为书例证的介绍课程直接去找专家.

sentences.en: Introductory biology texts tend to be compilations of conclusions.
sentences.cn: 导论式的生物学教科书,多倾向于结论的汇编.

sentences.en: Introductory booklets and sales instructions for your clients'reference are enclosed today.
sentences.cn: 今天附上一些说明小册子和供你方客户参考的推销说明书.

sentences.en: Life - saving Zi Jiu Method Introductory Talks held at Sg. Petani, Kedah, Malaysia.
sentences.cn: 在吉打双溪大年举办的生命自救功法介绍讲座会.

sentences.en: Our design of this introductory computer - science subject reflects two major concerns.
sentences.cn: 我们这门计算机科学的导论课程主要关注两个方面的问题.

sentences.en: The document is accompanied by your card and customizable introductory copy.
sentences.cn: 文档也会附带有你的虚拟名片和定制的宣传目录副本.

sentences.en: The introductory course will be for the same participants as the sales training course.
sentences.cn: 介绍课程的对象跟销售培训课程的对象相同.

sentences.en: The introductory style seemed a little superfluous.
sentences.cn: 这种客套未免有点儿多余.

sentences.en: The paper is composed of introductory, body and postscript.
sentences.cn: 论文分引言 、 主体、后记三个部分.

sentences.en: The reader is referred to the excellent introductory text.
sentences.cn: 读者可以参阅卓越的导论性的书.

sentences.en: We shall present certain introductory notions that pertain to finite deformation in this chapter.
sentences.cn: 在这一章里,这们将初步地介绍一些关于有限变形的概念.

sentences.en: We will accept the price reduction on radios as an introductory line.
sentences.cn: 作为首次推出的产品,方同意收音机降价.

words.tran_cn: 介绍；引进；采用；入门；传入

trans.tran_cn: 引导的，介绍的，导言的，开端的，序
trans.tran_en: said or written at the beginning of a book, speech etc in order to explain what it is about
